column1:
Table 8.6: COST ESTIMATE OF SOME PRINCIPAL CROPS IN FIVE 
MAJOR PRODUCING STATES
Source : Directorate of Economics and Statistics, Ministry of Agriculture
1. Cost A2 includes all actual expenses in cash & kind incurred in production by owner and rent paid for leased in land.

2. Cost C2 includes all actual expenses in cash & kind incurred in production by owner, interest on value of owned fixed capital assets (excluding land), rental value of owned land (net of land revenue), rent paid for leased-in land and imputed value of family labour.
3. FL - Family Labour, is imputed on the basis of statutory wage rate or the actual market rate, whichever is higher.
